data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Held On October 15, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30 of Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing obligation and
Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015, we are enclosing Un-audited Financial Results of
the Company for the Half year/Quarter ended on 30' September 2022 together with a copy
of the Limited Review Report from the Auditors, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing
Regulations, 2015. The above results are approved by the Board of Directors of the Company
at their meeting held today.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Held On 14 July 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30 of Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing obligation and
Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015, we are enclosing Un-audited Financial Results of
the Company for the first quarter ended on 30 June 2022 together with a copy of the
Limited Review Report from the Auditors, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing
Regulations, 2015. The above results are approved by the Board of Directors of the Company
at their meeting held today.

March 31, 2022.
